transcript:
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Yes sir.
Customer: Mr. Vishal?
Executive: Yes sir.
Customer: Ha, this is Mr. Srinithi from Hitech Industries.
Executive: Yes sir.
Customer: Ha, abhi kuch bhai ka phone aaya tha ki aap bol rahe ho ki IndiaMART insist ki aapko aapka jo customer number hai wo batana padega tab jaake ye problem sort out hoga.
Executive: Sir, main aapko explain karta hu.
Customer: Nahi nahi, humko actually usme hatane mein koi dikkat nahi hai, that is not an issue. Par aap aapko to malum hai labeling and packaging ke kuch norms government ne set kiye hue hai. According to we have to you know comply those rules and regulations that were the government jo metrology act hai labeling and packaging ke.
Customer: To usme wo crystal clear likha hua hai ki you cannot hide or you cannot remove your this details. Otherwise create some legal non compliances on the part of our side. IndiaMART ko kuch problem nahi hai aap samajh rahe ho. Ki wo packaging to hamara hai IndiaMART ka to hai nahi. Aapka to ek medium hai aap samjho.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Wo non compliance hoti hai aur kuch bhi questions arise hota hai na to in that case what we should do? Kyunki ya fir mujhe IndiaMART ko ek wo karna pade ki bhai hum we are using this and you are just you know compelling us ki bhi hum ye nahi kar sakte. Kyunki aapka bhi kuch terms aur ya kuch policy aap logo ne set kiya hua hai, thik hai? Koi bhi customer yadi aapke paas se kahi direct chala jaaye, customer care number ka ye ek rehta hai ki aapka customer kahi direct chala jaaye to IndiaMART ka wo wajood hai wo khatam ho jata hai, thik hai?
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Wo hum log kya hai sir pichle aap dekh lo hamara history dekh lo dhyan se 10-12 years se hum log IndiaMART se jude hue hai. Aur aapka jo platform hai na wo ekdam achi tarah se banaya gaya hai ki maan lo ki main ek saal usko renew karta hu, thik hai?
Executive: Ha.
Customer: Dusre saal main renew nahi karta hu, thik hai? To mujhe jo customer base chahiye na wo mujhe nahi milega. Existing customer base to mera ek saal ka jo jitna bana hai wo bana hai usme se main business karu na karu wo that's different issue. Lekin aapka jo 50 lakhs, 60 lakhs ka jo portal pe IndiaMART ke portal pe ke jo buyers ya sellers ka jo base hai na abhi aaj abhi to ye main kam figure bata raha hu shayad usse jyada hoga. Kam nahi hoga. Jahan tak main samajh raha hu na ye 4 million ya 5 million figure to takriban teen char saal pehle ka tha.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Abhi to aur bhi jyada hoga actual figure to. To wo jaise main yadi kuch cheez karta hu to I am depriving myself from the benefit of this such a wide database, thik hai?
Executive: Correct. Correct sir.
Customer: To wo aap jaise wo aap jo ek cheez dekho aap logo ne ye platform banaya hai to aap ye sochoge jahir si baat hai ki bhi hamara business kat jaaye hum aisa kyun kare, hamara hi platform to hum aisa kyun kare. Main aapki jagah hu to sahi baat hai. Lekin aap mere perspective se dekhoge na to hum log kya karte hai aap jitna bhi buylead humko dete ho na to hum log usko consume karte hai. Hum log jahan tak abhi pichle ek dedh saal se hamara personal reasons ki wajah se hum log utna consume nahi kar pa rahe. Aap hamara data check karoge na lekin we consistently continuously hum log usko renew kara rahe hai, uski ek wajah hai. Kyunki aapki jo buylead humko jo milti hai plus free leads bhi aati hai jiski koi costing humko nahi lagti hai aur hamara database humko ye batata hai ki usme se bhi humko business mil raha hai.
Executive: Ji. Ji.
Customer: To yadi main IndiaMART ke sath apna wo relations nahi continue karta hu to ye benefit mujhe nahi milne wala main jaanta hu aur ye jo platform hai na aap nahi manoge all over India mein aapko to mujhe to pata nahi hai lekin main mera yadi aap issue dekhoge na to due to IndiaMART platform aur jaise ye jo abhi to aane wale 5-10 saal mein B2B platform bahut ache ho jayenge. Aur to hum logo ne ek bhi sales ka banda nahi rakha hai. Aap you cannot imagine yadi aap samjho sales ka banda hum rakhte hai to paise ka wo lena business wo karna wo sab eliminate ho gaya seedha IndiaMART ke portal through ye business hota hai aur uska credibility jyada hota hai kyunki verified buyers and sellers hote hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm. Yes sir.
Customer: To iski wajah se hum hamara jo intention hai na wo clear cut hai ki koi bhi government ka mandatory jo compliance hai wo non compliance hamari or se nahi ho. Dusri cheez yadi main ek saal se aapse juda hota na to koi ye baat maan lo ki ek bar maan ke bhi chal sakte ki yaar aaj ek saal ke liye aaya fir agle saal to aa bhi nahi sakta hai. Lekin aap hamara track record dekhoge na pichle 10-12 saal se hum jude hue hai to hum aisa kyun karenge yaar. IndiaMART se yadi itna acha business mil raha hai hum ek saal mein hum uska jo renewal fee bhar ke hum log jo develop karte hai to hum kyun kare aisa aap aap meri jagah pe aap karte nahi karte yaar. Hum logo ko to yahi hamara intentions aap samjho ye nahi hai ki mujhe kahi aur chale jaana hai ki aapke sath jude nahi rehna hai, thik hai? Hamara intention ye hai ki koi bhi government ka jo compliance hai wo hamari wajah se koi dikkat nahi aaye. Hum log ek bhi paise ka hum ek bhi paise ka hum log cash ka business nahi karte hai. We do have 100% official business. Billing ka hi even sample bhi jata hai na to wo billing se hi jata hai.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: To that is the reason ke why we insist IndiaMART aur aap logo se hamari jo ye behas chal rahi hai na wo regarding wohi bare mein chal rahi hai. You just don't think ki ki hum log kahi aur chale jayenge aisa nahi hai warna hum kyun 12 saal se aap logo ke sath jude hote yaar. Agree with that sir.
Executive: Main ek cheez discuss kar sakta hu sir.
Customer: Ha boliye na.
Executive: Actually mein aapne mujhe apna point discuss kiya hai sir. Please try to understand my situation sir. Maine apni side se bahut try kiya aapka jo product hai jo images sir mujhe share kar rahe the wo approve karwane ke liye aur even maine wo karwai bhi sir.
Customer: Bilkul.
Executive: Par sir kya ek issue aa raha hai sir hamara aap samajh sakte hai ki agar itna bada database hai hamare paas har ek customer ki profile maintain karna usko run karna proper tarike se uske liye sir hum software pe bhi work karte hai sir. Humne backend se hi aisa setup lagaya hai ki agar koi image add ho rahi hai aur usme kahi par bhi identify ho raha hai ki koi personal number ya fir koi personal information kisi client ki share ho rahi hai aap automatically detect hoti hai.
Customer: Personal number ye bhi hota hai to main samajh sakta hu lekin customer care jahan jo number se jo registered number hai jisme business chalta hai na wo number wo aur hota hai kyunki us pe bahut sare customers ke seedhe phone aate hai hume. To wo hamare liye bahut mayne rakhta hai aap samjho aur abhi aap aap jo ye bata rahe ho yadi koi personal main aapki baat se sehmat hu yadi wo personal number hota to lekin wo to registered number hai aur Hitech Industries kahi pe bhi jahan pe bhi hamara jo hai na wo registered number sab yahi chalta hai. Yadi main I gate ka ya fir wo jo export ke liye kuch bhi hum log jo karte hai na to har jagah pe registered number sab yahi hai Vishal ji aur koi number nahi hai. We do have a many personal numbers to wo to koi rehta hi nahi hai yaar.
Executive: Main bilkul aapka point samajh raha hu sir. But jahan kahan problem create ho rahi hai aapka IndiaMART ki profile pe bhi jo number hai aur jo exactly aapke waha par jo number hai dono number same hai aur wo personal number hai sir. Bas ye problem yahi par aa rahi hai sir.
Customer: India nahi IndiaMART ki jo profile hai as a business hum log karte hai, thik hai? Koi bhi partner hota hai uska number kyunki dekho Hitech Industries ka koi number nahi hota hai aap samajh rahe ho. Main landline lu na landline to hum le sakte hai lekin landline ko koi matlab nahi mobile ke zamane mein kaun landline leta hai, fax ke liye chahiye humko. Lekin hum hum logo ko hamare liye mobile se aap bhi dekho na koi bhi aap aap kahan se bhi koi bhi ho na IndiaMART apna web portal chalae to aapka ek alag se number hoga, thik hai? Aapke liye sahi hai lekin hum log business karte hai to mobile to mobile hi jyadatar baat hoti hai. Kuch bhi wo aapko messages bhejne hote hai ya kuch bhi catalogs bhejna hota hai to seedha mobile through chala jata hai. IndiaMART ke platform through bhi jata hai aur seedha maan lo ki customers mobile apna deta hai ki bhi ye mera number hai aur hum log quotation usko bhej dete hai jaise aage jata hai. Mera ek quotation IndiaMART ke platform through hi jata hai aise bahut sare maine bheje hum log kya personal PDF se bana ke bhejte hai. IndiaMART humko provide karti hai facility lekin hum logo ne hamara wo khud ka banaya hua hai ki wo quotation party ke paas chale jata hai. Hum log saalo se aise hi business karte hai fir bhi we are you know we are renewing with the IndiaMART kyunki wo humko base provide karta hai aap samjho. Hum hum jo jo efforts dalte hai jo khud ka business develop karne ke liye IndiaMART is supporting us to grow our businesses. To hum kyun aisa karenge yaar aap main ye nahi samajh pa raha hu aur dusri cheez.
Executive: Main aapka point bilkul valid samajh raha hu sir but please yaha par ek bari hamari situation bhi samjhiye.
Customer: Yaha nahi aap samjho aap jo situation ki baat kar rahe ho na usme aap kya karte ho malum hai ki aap kisi bhi customer ko compel kar rahe ho ki yaar wo koi bhi kal aage jaake koi bhi maan lo ki mandatory requirement ki wajah se legal non compliance banti hai to wo customer ko kuch problem aayegi to IndiaMART wo to seedha bolega bhi we are not responsible for that. Wo to aapka packaging hai wo aapka hai to aap kahan se beech mein aaoge to wo problem to wo pareshani customer ke liye ho jayegi yaar.
Executive: Sir isme ek solution hai sir aap ek baat batao main aapke product ko promote karne ke liye nahi mana kar raha. Main aapke product ko as it is promote karna chahta hu main bas aapse ek request kar raha tha jo aap mere sath jo image share kar rahe hai apne product ki bas usme wo number jo visible ho rahe hai agar aap us number ko matlab crop karke mujhe share kar de sir. Dekho main bhi aapke liye solution nikalna chahta hu sir kyunki meri company mein sir wo by default reject honge aisa nahi ki aapka khali.
Customer: Nahi nahi aap meri samjho customer care ki jahan pe detail ki baat aati hai na sir aap ek aapne to kabhi main aapko uska pura provision bhej dunga, thik hai? Chalo main ek kaam karta hu ki main main mail pe bheju ya kaise bheju? Main highlight karke bhej dunga.
Executive: Aap mail pe bhej dijiye koi.
Customer: Wo jo mandatory requirement jo rakhi hui hai na usme to main ek bar aapko wo bhejna chahta hu ek bar aap you just go through it.
Executive: Sir main yahi keh raha tha aap aap product ke upar wo mention karwaiye sir product ke upar main aapko nahi rok raha ki aap usko mention mat kariye.
Customer: Acha thik hai wo aap IndiaMART ke portal pe hi aap wo image ki baat kar rahe ho.
Executive: Correct. That is not an issue main wo samajh gaya aapki baat wo aapne jo beech wala jo rasta nikala hai na that I got your point.
Executive: Product promote karo sir aap mere number bas visible na ho is tarike se reject kar dijiye.
Customer: I got your point that is not lekin aap ek bar bhi main samajh gaya aapko aapka jo point of view hai na that is not an issue or debatable bhi nahi hai I got your point. Main ye dhyan rakhunga ki bhi aisa ho to wo jo number hai na wo blur ho jaaye, thik hai?
Executive: Correct sir.
Customer: Ha wo samajh gaya aap what I'll do main apni side se ek bar designing mein dekh leta hu, thik hai? Kuch bhi dikkat ya kuch wo ya fir outright mujhe remove karna padega ya fir image blur ho jati hai to main I'll just you know check with the designers main ek bar baat kar leta hu fir bhi kuch hoga to aapse main baat karunga, thik hai? Sir aur ye ye right solution hai.
Executive: Hai even nahi nahi mera agar main aapka ek product bhi as a special basis pe karta hu na sir you know we have the different suppliers available on IndiaMART sir unki request bhi ho jayegi ki mera number bhi aap promote kariye.
Customer: Nahi nahi aap dekhiye why we should worry isliye ki abhi hum logo ne 35-36 product rakhe hai actually hamare portfolio mein more than 75 plus products hai aur takriban March April tak wo all 125-130 ho jayenge. To hum log wo pure ke pure jitne bhi products hai na wo detail ke sath IndiaMART ke portal pe upload karne wale hai with images catalogs wo sab aayega. To hum ye hum hamara hamara concern sirf yahi tha ki aapke ye aap teen char bar ya itna prolong discussions aur ye jo chala na wo uski wajah ye thi ki ki we do value the relationship with the IndiaMART kyunki humko malum hai uska benefits hota hai lekin aisa bhi nahi ho ki humko aur bhi pareshani jhelni pade that is the only solution aur aapne jo beech wala rasta bataya wo sahi hai koi baat nahi usme aapko bhi koi pareshani nahi ho aur hume bhi pareshani nahi ho.
Executive: Correct sir correct sir. I do understand.
Customer: Thik hai aur kuch bhi hoga to main aapko ek bar baat karunga aapse, thik hai?
Executive: Thik hai abhi koi aur solution meri side se aapka koi hai jo requirement ho.
Customer: Nahi nahi bas bas ye yahi hai. It's a nice talking to you Vishal.
Executive: Kya main concern close kar sakta hu sir yaha se?
Customer: Bilkul bilkul aap kar dijiye aap kar dijiye.
Executive: Thik hai then sir agar koi bhi product aapka fir bhi in case agar by mistake kahin pe reject ho please aap mujhe immediately.
Customer: Bilkul bilkul I'll just you know contact you on that point.
Executive: Thik hai sir main aapka concern yaha par close karta hu. Thank you have a nice day sir.
Customer: Okay have a nice day to you.
Executive: Thank you. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's product images getting rejected.

- Customer concerned about government compliance issues.

- Customer wants to promote products with visible number.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to blur the number in images.

- Executive will check with designers about the issue.

- Executive will send the customer provision on mail.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will contact if any issue persists.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- image rejection, compliance, indiaMART platform, product promotion
